resources.string: Welcome to Dora Explorer Game. We need help Dora to find a way to back home. But in the middle of the journey many kidnappers who lurked to kidnap Dora. So Dora must face several obstacles so that she can escape the kidnappers. If dora fails through obstacles then she will be kidnapped. Our job is to make sure dora can return home safely.
Dora arrived home safely with Boots
